BRANCH ADMINISTRATOR

OBJECTIVE

Obtain a challenging position which will demonstrate and highlight my organizational, customer service, communication, and project management skills.

SUMMARY

Committed and motivated Administrative Assistant with exceptional customer service and decision making skills.
Strong work ethic, professional demeanor and great initiative.Energetic and reliable Office Manager skilled with working with a diverse group of people.
Excellent team-building skills.
Motivated personable business professional with a successful track record in the business and retail field.
Quickly master new technologies and skills.
Diplomatic and tactful with professionals and non-professionals at all levels.
Accustomed to handling sensitive, confidential records.
Demonstrated history of producing accurate, timely reports.
Flexible and versatile - able to maintain a sense of humor under pressure.
Thrive in deadline-driven environments.
Highlights
Skills Summary ◆ Project Management ◆ Report Preparation ◆ Written Correspondence ◆ General Office Skills ◆ Computer Savvy ◆ Customer Service ◆ Scheduling ◆ Distribution ◆ Communication ◆ Accounting/Bookkeeping ◆ Front-Office Operations ◆ Bi-Lingual Spanish
Microsoft Office proficiency Excel spreadsheets Meticulous attention to detail Strong problem solver Self-directed Professional and mature Resourceful Dedicated team player Strong interpersonal skills Proofreading

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Received a merit raise for strong attention to detail, exemplary customer service and team-player attitude.Successfully planned and executed corporate meetings, lunches and special events for groups of employees.

EXPERIENCE

<JD_START>
Job Title: District Store Manager

Location: Punta Gorda, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Location(s):Specific Location Requirement: No, but must be able to service a general areaCountry: United States of AmericaCity: Punta GordaState: FLPostal Code: 33950Signing Bonus: NegotiableBonus Description: Quarterly bonuses that average $3k per quarter, depending on performanceRelocation Package: FullMust-Haves:4+ years of Multi-Unit Operations experience in one or more of the following: retail, restaurant, hotel, leasing, rental, or other customer service operation with responsibility for operating 10+ stores.Passion for hiring, developing, and retaining top talent to deliver legendary customer experiences.Experience with controllable expenses and management of expenses.Longevity in position - no job-hopping (More than 3 years with each company).Must have experience managing over 10 stores in their market.Nice-To-Haves:Bachelor’s degree preferred.Local candidate is ideal. We will provide relocation if needed.Job Description:As a District Manager reporting to the Division Vice President, you will be responsible for overseeing the operational performance of multiple stores within your assigned district. Your primary focus will be on ensuring the delivery of legendary customer experiences, driving sales growth, and managing expenses effectively.Key Responsibilities:Manage the operations of multiple stores within your district, ensuring compliance with company standards and policies.Recruit, hire, train, and develop top talent to build high-performing teams that deliver exceptional customer service.Implement strategies to drive sales growth and achieve financial targets.Monitor and manage controllable expenses to optimize profitability.Conduct regular store visits to assess performance, provide coaching, and ensure compliance with operational standards.Collaborate with store managers to identify opportunities for improvement and implement action plans.Build strong relationships with store teams, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment.Act as a liaison between corporate leadership and store teams, communicating company initiatives, policies, and procedures.Utilize data and analytics to identify trends, forecast sales, and make informed business decisions.Must-Haves:4+ years of Multi-Unit Operations experience in retail, restaurant, hotel, leasing, rental, or other customer service operation with responsibility for operating 10+ stores.Passion for hiring, developing, and retaining top talent to deliver legendary customer experiences.Experience with controllable expenses and management of expenses.Longevity in position - no job-hopping (More than 3 years with each company).Must have experience managing over 10 stores in their market.Nice-To-Haves:Bachelor’s degree preferred.Local candidate is ideal. We will provide relocation if needed.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
